website_summaries.verdict: Great for organizing lots of items at a heavier weight.
pros: Each cube measures 14 inches by 14 inches with 1.5 cubic feet of volume
This unit comes with 12 separate storage containers
Great option to use as a pet fence too
Rust-resistant steel is highly durable and long lasting
With tool-free assembly, this bookcase snaps quickly and easily in place
cons: This is a larger unit and isn't suited for smaller spaces

customer_reviews.title: FALL APART EASILY
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really love these because I live in a small space and was looking for extra storage. The storage cubes are easy to put together but the slightest movement and they fall apart. Once they fall apart you have to remove everything that was in them and rebuild them. The other disappointment was it doesn’t come with enough corner pieces to join them together. I have 8 metal squares with no appropriate parts to join them together. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Arellano

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what happened to this company...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd set if these from this dealer. As good as the first set was, these are bad. They must be sourcing them from a different supplier now. The plastic parts are brittle. About 1⁄3 shattered on installation without even getting as far as tapping them on with the little hammer. I had to secure everything with zip ties since there were many broken plastic pegs. The wire appears to be a thinner gauge than my older set and a couple of the ends are loose. Even the little wood hammer included was cracked with a splintery handle. If I didn't need these urgently, I would be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Thorfinn

customer_reviews.title: Decent Storage
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the instructions intimidate you. This is really easy to assemble once you get the first square together. After that it is just a matter of making sure the connectors are facing in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Roop

customer_reviews.title: I love It! It was easy to assemble and came ...
customer_reviews.text: I love It! It was easy to assemble and came with a wooden mallet. But I was one grid short of having 20 cubes unfortunately. I used closet maid anchors to make sure it's safe. Great shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Well-worth the money; it looks very presentable, in any room.
customer_reviews.text: Depending on how you decide to arrange this and what you place upon it, you won't necessarily need zip ties. I'd recommend using pliers to get the panels completely seated in the plastic connectors as they seem to get an extra click or two during assembly; there should be very little space between connecting sections.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Generally quite happy; not rock solid
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite happy, but it's not a perfect product. You're probably concerned with how solid it is after being assembled. My best description of this is that it is a little worse than a tightly-assembled Lego set. What I mean is that things snap into place, and with some force you can force it together fairly tightly, but try to pull on it and it comes apart. If you put books on it, the structure will also deform a little. In general, it does what I want, and I think I'm happy with the stability, but like I said, it's not rock solid or anything.
customer_reviews.author: alqz

customer_reviews.title: Best Cubes Ever for Artist Alley!
customer_reviews.text: WOW WOW WOW! Best cubes I have EVER worked with. If you are an Artist Alley Vendor I would absolutely recommend them. They are super easy to snap together and also to break apart. This is my booth at the first convention and the set that makes 20 cubes was packed nicely, came with a wooden mallet, and also I made the display attached with just the grids from the package and still had some left over.
customer_reviews.author: April P.

customer_reviews.title: Just one example of...
customer_reviews.text: So, I have storage cubes EVERYWHERE. There's a couple in the back of this pic. They work great, and they help me organize my horrendous mess. I like that these ones are metal all around, so they can hold a bit more. Easy to set up, too. Why spend hundreds of dollars on furniture that's hard to move, when you can just store your books and clothes in cubes that you can assemble and disassemble as needed? Utility! Portability! Moddability! What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: G.S. Fordham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and dismayed!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive my order. It had just the look I wanted for my home office to shelve photo albums, 3-ring binders, books and such. While assembling it, I found the little mallet to be too lightweight to be of any use, so I snapped everything together using my hands and a thick cloth to protect them. After two weeks, the thing totally collapsed while I was sifting through papers in one of the bins last night, dumping everything onto the floor. What a disappointment! The info says, "Whether it's decorative items or your personal library, it won’t buckle under the weight of what you store in it." Well, it buckled.
customer_reviews.author: Z.T. Noble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to organize my yarn supply!
customer_reviews.author: Romy

customer_reviews.title: Good storage
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Not very strong, but if you apply zip ties its stronger. I assembled them into three separate links of five cubes for the tops of my closet and one as a shelf for my daughter. I wish they sent extra connectors for separate assembly. I still have slates too build 4 cubicles, but i have to buy more connectors first.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Forever

customer_reviews.title: A bit cheap
customer_reviews.text: Instructions included were for another product they sell but I was able to figure out how it worked. Some of the shelves were a bit bent. Clips aren't consistent in their hold, you hear the click but they aren't solidly together. This is a large, heavy item and is working for what I need. extra clips were included as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wag D'Tail

customer_reviews.title: These seem strong and sturdy. Only gave 4 stars because the list of ...
customer_reviews.text: These seem strong and sturdy. Only gave 4 stars because the list of pieces shows door panels, door magnets, door connector, etc. These parts were not in the box. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and works great in our kids' playroom!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone and Shawnette Graham

customer_reviews.title: Use heavy duty zip ties to make your own individual storage cubes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The trick is to ditch the connectors that come with them and use zip ties to make the structure stronger and more adaptable. Just don't make them too tight, because they need a little play to settle into a 90-degree angle. It'll take some trial and error to get the feel right, but worth the time because you'll have so many possibilities!
customer_reviews.author: The Captain

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, modular, and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This was actually quite a bit more sturdy than I expected. The modular design is perfect because I had an awkward wall in a closet so I built it to fit my space. Perfect for holding most of my wardrobe including shoes. Assembly was fairly simple, especially if you follow the directions in terms of what order to put what pieces in place- it minimized having to keep pushing panels and connectors back into position. I did order extra connectors so I can use the remaining panels in another spot- if you aren't building as pictured there won't be enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gode Potratz

customer_reviews.title: A Lightweight Shelf At Best
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. This is advertised as a bookshelf that can hold up to 44lbs per cube. This is untrue and false advertising! I spent precious time putting the bookshelf together securely and putting books and other items on it. Then, I went to bed. I awoke the next morning to the whole thing broken in the middle of my floor. Such a mess. I had to spend more time picking everything up and then putting all the pieces back in the box to ship back. Save yourself time and don't buy unless you want to store items that weigh nothing more than 2lbs per cube!
customer_reviews.author: Christine McClung

customer_reviews.title: A great lightweight, easy storage option.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit frustrating to assemble, but great for lightweight shelving. Don't store items that are too heavy on them. They're great for a closet or in a craft room. I definitely wouldn't use them in a garage for paint or tools, though.
customer_reviews.author: NKakanis

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The quality is a little less than great, but for the price it is exactly what I was expecting. We used these in the showroom of our dealership to display clothing. They went together easily and I put zip ties around each joint just to be extra safe. Again, for the price, this is a great set!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: They are super sturdy and the display looked great (picture included
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to make a display to sell my art at a comic con and they worked VERY well. They are super sturdy and the display looked great (picture included. If you like the art in the picture you can see more at facebook.com/MartyrMedusa )
customer_reviews.author: Jessa Young

customer_reviews.title: Only limit is space and creativity
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are just what I needed to get myself organized. I had a concept for an entertainment center, but u didn't know how I was make it happen until I saw these shelves. They are just as strong as advertised, if not stronger. Just add a zip tie or two at each corner, and these things are beastly strong. A little metal strapping with wall anchors and you can make floating cubes that go over and around anything. Very glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brian Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. Wish it was easier to figure out how to play around with different configurations. Will update one I try experimenting different setups
customer_reviews.author: Phon  Vongdara

customer_reviews.title: Tespo-20 unit wire cubes. Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I had to place an order for over 75 units, Tespo representative Emily was great. She handled my order and provided great customer service. Thank you Emily for all you did to get my order to me in a timely manor and working with me on the price. The wire units are great for my business. Dawn
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E. DuBois

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product. I like the flexibility I have in creating designs I want to fit in particular spaces. I found it easy to connect the pieces. In addition, the storage spaces do not overwhelm the rooms. I would recommend that you offer more connectors in the package so I don't have to order more separately as I had to do.
customer_reviews.author: Goshen

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: great product ...... I'm a modeler and do a diverse range of model from metal/plastic, wooden ships, cannons classic cars, etc. Hence I always need more space to store materials ....but also to display my finished projects. Great system ....goes together easy ....with online assembly manual for reference. Very sturdy and durable ......I would recommend these selves to anybody need more storage space. But the Hammer they include I think they meant as a joke. Donald Harris
customer_reviews.author: Donald Harris

customer_reviews.title: I think these will be a perfect solution for a cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I think these will be a perfect solution for a cheaper, cost effective pantry storage system. Was sad to see some of the wires not completely pinned down at the spot welds but figure I'll be zip tying these and buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Tub Lover

customer_reviews.title: must have item for the non rich
customer_reviews.text: doesn't hold a lot of weight but i love them. i divided this into 4 units. great for dorm rooms or apt.s. near disposable but, should last forever if you want it to.
customer_reviews.author: amonson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Perfect for dorm or small apartment. Not good for holding more than about 5 small books, though. I also bought fabric cube drawers where I can place items I don't want seems and which make it look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: Only sturdy if you modify it
customer_reviews.text: Worked for my purposes but only by adding zip ties to all the corners for support. It kept falling apart before zip tying it together. And I did make sure all the shelving was tight into the corner pieces, it's not that I didn't get them in properly.
customer_reviews.author: R. E.

customer_reviews.title: Not for outside use
customer_reviews.text: This might be a great idea to use indoors but I was using them outdoors and the plastic clips that hold the wire together became brittle and broke quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy cubes
customer_reviews.text: We used these cubes to build a cage for our rabbits and they worked absolutely perfectly. The only (very very minor) issue we have is that the connectors aren't super intuitive to use. That said, we figured them out pretty quickly and we're able to build a spacious and sturdy home for our bunnies. I would definitely buy these cubes again.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! The pieces don’t stay together at the top! It is not sturdy because of that. Either the pieces aren’t cut correctly or the whole thing is just a piece of junk! So disappointed! Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I been through many plastic organizers that fell apart, but this holds great. I wouldn’t recommend putting anything heavier than a textbook on it. I just use it for clothes. I found some cute covers that I use as doors. Love love love it’
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a c&c cage for our guinea pigs, and so far it's been great! The cage has held together strongly and was ready to assemble. I had excess cubes so I used it for a smaller bookshelf
customer_reviews.author: John Yan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together I set this up in my Sewing room and put my crafts in them. Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: bemaw_2000

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy. I had some in the past that didn't collapse.
customer_reviews.text: Sigh...I ended up reinforcing it with zip ties! Yes, I made sure the panels snapped into the disks, but the darn thing collapsed on me twice, and I had not used all the panels. The zip ties helped.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: maybe not the best for them
customer_reviews.text: Quick to assemble... I’m using for records... maybe not the best for them... but it looks good and I think it will hold up... maybe a little flexing but not bad
customer_reviews.author: dj kaz

customer_reviews.title: and easy enough to put together but they are really flimsy ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough, and easy enough to put together but they are really flimsy shelves. If anything you put on them has any weight it will bow the shelf and your object will fall over.

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to Love it because I Love the way it looks after you put it together. BUT it fell apart so easily! I kept having to connect it every time I’d add anything to the rack. And when one gets loose, another follows! Became so annoyed that I just stopped using it
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Very good storage
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you use ties at each connection. The unit is too large and will not stay together if you only use the corner clips provided.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Shelves are really sturdy and easy to put together (with 2 people)
customer_reviews.text: Shelves are really sturdy and easy to put together (with 2 people). I bought this for my classroom as cubbies for my students and it is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Poll

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: My tespo is missing 1 side of one cube. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Stygar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, strong, and holds a ton of stuff. I moved to a small apartment and this took 30 square feet of unused and empty wall space into a productive wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to have a bad time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a few months now and at this point I’ve had to zip tie them all together. When one part pops out and you’ve try to pop it back in all the other ones pop out. It’s infuriatingly flimsy and I’m pretty sure half of them are bent in such a way that they simply will not fit back in. While I love how it looks it’s really impossible to use these shelves for anything remotely heavy such as books etc. pretty disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: maddy gotbaum

customer_reviews.title: Also a connector for a corner setup would be nice.
customer_reviews.text: Connectors do not stay on and to add stability I had to secure each connection with cable ties. These should be included in the kit. Also a connector for a corner setup would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora Self

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces, and wrong assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and the assembly instructions inside were for a totally different product. I decided to figure it out for myself, setup wasn't that complicated, and then realized it was missing SEVERAL pieces! 2 wire grates are missing so I can't complete 12 cubes as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was able to put together easily, they supplied a wooden hammer. It works well for what I need it to and it is pretty decent. Thinking about buying more for my trailer and closets of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie and Britt

customer_reviews.title: I love that I always have options
customer_reviews.text: I used these in my closet under the clothes to store my shoes. I love that I always have options! The kids room is organized nicely with their toys as well. It’s so easy to put together and they’re really strong
customer_reviews.author: Amber Riha

customer_reviews.title: but this is not a great solution if you have uneven floors
customer_reviews.text: Decent price, but this is not a great solution if you have uneven floors. The connectors are constantly popping off when assembled as a 4x5 cube structure, so I am going to try dividing it into two units to see if that works better (even though I will 'lose' some cubes in the process, which shouldn't be an issue since many are empty already - this thing is huge!).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Carl Jr

customer_reviews.title: Shorted one box
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy just time consuming. Was shorted one box so only 19 cubes. Was reached out to by seller, and seller is going to ship the missing box. Seller was very nice and polite.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. Using it in our closet to hold all of our board games.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Eisenbacher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love! Very sturdy! I think I might have been missing some Peggy though
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: I loved how easy it was to put together I just ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it was to put together I just with they gave us more of the round things (technical name no clue). I could have made more shelves and had to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: M!ck!

customer_reviews.title: These shelves look great and do exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: These shelves look great and do exactly what I need, they organized the closets of two 10ish boys. One of the sets is loaded with books and is holding the load very well, I am surprised how sturdy they are. I contacted customer support with a question and they were terrific. I am very pleased with the product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP MATERIAL. DO NOT MIND
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT BROKE AND DAMAGED MY FUNKO POPS. Took ages to assemble and then bent under the weight of funko pops. FUNKO POPS!
customer_reviews.author: jade nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to make
customer_reviews.text: This is basically impossible to put together. The mallet literally broke on my first swing, and even when I did use it, it did nothing to actually help put the shelves together
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Slick

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture, not enough plastic connectors, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The picture is misleading, there are not nearly enough caged squares to make what it shows you but there are plenty more black hard (but malleable) plastic covered squares. The design is eh, take it or leave it. Overall, pretty sturdy for what it is, my 10 lb cat sits comfortably inside without breaking it. I wish there were more connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: It works great but in order for it to be sturdy you ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought the tespo set to make a guineapig cage for my pets. It works great but in order for it to be sturdy you have to use zip ties. I’m not sure if I would trust it with heavy objects otherwise. You can make some pretty cool designs and objects with this! Definitely doesn’t have to be JUST a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So I use these for all my yarn. They are wonderful. They go up quick and come down just as fast when you’re ready to move them. If you don’t stack them super high, like more than 4/5, they are pretty sturdy as well
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Verbanac

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: So fun to build! It tolerated being taken apart and rebuilt.
customer_reviews.author: kevin conway

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble in a variety of configurations
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble in a variety of configurations. I used zip ties for added stability, and the cubes made organizing my walk-in closet a dream! VERY STURDY!
customer_reviews.author: Jannie Marsolek

customer_reviews.title: I particularly like that it can be arranged in different configurations to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. I particularly like that it can be arranged in different configurations to suit your needs. It's easy to put together and is sturdy. It's inexpensive too!
customer_reviews.author: Maggiesmark

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was a snap to put together! Sturdy, looks great with my Thirty One products on display!
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Pardon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and customization. I wish there was more accessories for the grid
customer_reviews.author: KaoLee

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality..
customer_reviews.text: Response wire storage cubes were easy to assemble. The reason I’m giving only 3 start because it’s flimsy and not a high quality product: not all plastic locks hold wire plates in place and several wires broke off ... I had to use plastic zip ties to make sure the structure stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Felix S Liderman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good it's holding its own in the laundry room in a sorority house.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Easily reconfigured when needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made storage system. The best thing is that it can be taken apart and configured differently for different needs. I have it against a wall in a bedroom with yarns, but could only put 3units across and 5units high. It is perfect for the space and I'll use the remaining 5 boxes in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Kewi

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My wife needed a bookcase that she could adjust the size of for inside closet,. This worked out great. Easy to assemble and strdy enough for paperwork and books.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, easy to assemble. Promptly responded to my questions.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: So much more than you expect
customer_reviews.text: I'm a creative type and put a few packages together to create something that looks great and looks even better.
customer_reviews.author: K.C. Loesch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product did not hold the weight it claims to hold. The plastic breaks easily. I had to end up throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: teachermom

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I love the flexible ways you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love the flexible ways you can build things with it. we used it to build a pen for our puppy. worked super well for that!
customer_reviews.author: rdh

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my bunny condo. I bought the 20 cube and still have 14 panels left over. Cubes became very sturdy once connected (with zip ties), so I’m sure they would make great shelves. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: The book case holds up well, looks nice, easy to assemble. Worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Looked so cool when put together. I didn’t have very much on it before it came tumbling down. I’ve put it back together three times.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the product!!!! I save a lot of space in my apartment
customer_reviews.author: George W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Can be used as table bases, and shelves of any shape. Best and studies cubes on the market.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are versatile and hold a lot of weight. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's home office. Great product at a reasonable price. Well made, and easy to assemble, though time-consuming. It is very sturdy without being bulky looking.
customer_reviews.author: Bonniesue

customer_reviews.title: Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I had a yarn stash that needed to be organized. These were easy to assemble. My room now looks neat and tidy. I love my cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy- just need some patience to ensure each end is pushed into each plastic holder until you hear it snap. Can be shelves, bins, animal cages- pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: There were two cubes missing and connectors for three cubes missing. Couldn’t find a number to contact anybody. How do I get the missing pieces?
customer_reviews.author: Frances Brasseaux

customer_reviews.title: the product is perfect. Quality is Excellent in this price
customer_reviews.text: During the assembly, 1 connector was broken.... I sent a message to Tespo. Tespo immediately delivered 4 connectors. After the installation, the product is perfect. Quality is Excellent in this price.
customer_reviews.author: Xinghua Huang

customer_reviews.title: They didn’t send me enough connectors.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get enough of the connector clips to assemble all of the panels.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with enough connectors to assemble the product
customer_reviews.author: LISA FLEITES

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Was able to design my cubes to fit my room with a unique look. Much better than a wood cube organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product went together quickly and easily and was sturdier than I expected. I am very pleased with this storage unit.
customer_reviews.author: Cayo Chica

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Very easy to fall apart
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Alvarez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So super easy to put together, my 10 year old daughter helped me, got it done fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kriley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn’t even look at instructions took maybe like 20-30 mins to finish it. Super easy and functional but I need extra connectors because I made my own creation but I don’t know where to get it there is no message to seller option :/
customer_reviews.author: ucarnazli

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need 7 more connectors and 4 more panels to complete 10 x 10 cube stacking option.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Lotz

customer_reviews.title: These bad boys rock
customer_reviews.text: Buying this again. These bad boys rock. Holds nice weight
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Having fun straightening my basement up!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia DiNicolantonio

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Easy customization. Love it! Perfect for the extra storage I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Turchiarelli

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put together. First time it fell apart while I tried to move it in place. Second time I used zip ties. However I stopped at 16 cubes (4 x 4) since it feels flimsy. It took me 2 days because I have health issues. Hopefully it will stay together. Purpose was to store my crafts. I would NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: gova

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Does its purpose. Very helpful customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I thought but will hold up contents in example photo
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much just like the picture but some of the metal siding things were a little wonky. Nothing that would be noticeable to someone who didn’t put it together, but it does have a few pieces that are not fitting correctly because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these cubes so much! Perfect for my crochet nook!
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity As Always

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely impressed!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this more than 5 stars, I probably would. I purchased this to build a new “condo” for my rabbit, who learned how to jump out of her current cage. These arrived in a timely manner and packaged decently! All 69 panels arrived and aside from one panel that had one piece loose, they were all perfect. The clips that are meant to hold the pieces together are very sturdy, but I chose to use cable ties, to make it more durable for my rabbit. I am absolutely impressed with how much these cubes are able to hold and the price was the best that I found! I would definitely recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sam25

customer_reviews.title: Good storage for board games
customer_reviews.text: Working great for me so far. I used these get increased storage height for my existing shelves. Some of the frames were a little bowed in or out but at this price that’s forgivable. Had a few connectors missing at the company very promptly shipped me replacement ones
customer_reviews.author: PhoenixAD

product_meta.title: Tespo Cube Storage Book Shelf Metal Bookcase Shelving Closet Organization System, 20, Wire Grid
product_meta.description: Size:20 CubesStyle and organize your home with a set of modular rack! The industrial look of this 20-cube modular shelving rack perfectly fits modern apartments, studios or office spaces. You can put it in the hallway to store shoes, in the living room to display books, plants, and photos or keep it in your bedroom for clothes and toys. DIY cubes You can build the cubes together to create a big cabinet, or you can build them separate in several blocks if you want to put them in different spaces. With the black ABS connectors, it will be very easy to put the panels together and to take them apart whenever you want to change the distribution of this wire grid modular bookcase. Product Specifications Materials: metal wire grids; ABS connectors Dimensions of each assembled cube: 14 x 14 x 14 in / 35 x 35 x 35 cm Weight capacity per cube: 44 lbs. / 20 kg Package Includes 69 x Wire grid panel 64 x Connector 2 x Clothes-hook 1 x Wooden hammer 1 x Assembly instruction sheet
feature_bullets: DIY STORAGE CUBE: Interlocking cubes giving you multiple stacking options, it can be made into any shape you like, as a single unit or any other shapes you can imagine.
STURDY AND DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Made from steel wire painted black and matching heavy duty plastic connectors.
FLEXIBLE AND TOOL-FREE ASSEMBLY: No tool is required for the assembly. Long lasting and easy to replace parts.
MULTIPURPOSE STORAGE: Utilize these Wire Storage Units at home to organize your items and save your space. Great for office, dorm or children's room.
SIZE & WEIGHT CAPACITY: The size of each unit is about 14*14*14". The Dimensions full storage: Height: 70" Width: 56" Depth:14" Each cube can hold Max 44 lb.
